entities.name: grawp
entities.description: GRAWP is mentioned as a location where teachers like McGonagall or Flitwick could have removed the swamp.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the one who had set an armed security troll to guard Harry's Firebolt and was struggling.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as the ones who had smashed through Umbridge's office door with their Cleansweeps.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the owner of the Firebolt that was removed to the dungeons.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as the one who fitted a new door and removed Harry's Firebolt.

entities.name: troublemakers-in-chief
entities.description: Troublemakers-in-Chief are mentioned as positions that were newly vacant.

entities.name: niffler
entities.description: Niffler is mentioned as an animal that was slipped into Umbridge's office and tore the place apart in its search for shiny objects.

relationships.description: Fred and George attacked Umbridge's office door with their Cleansweeps.
Harry owned the Firebolt that was removed to the dungeons by Umbridge.
Filch acted on behalf of Umbridge in removing Harry's Firebolt.
Niffler attacked Umbridge when it was slipped into her office.
Students were vying for the positions of Troublemakers-in-Chief.
